class.name: OccluderPolygon2D
class.description: Editor facility that helps you draw a 2D polygon used as resource for [LightOccluder2D].

members.member: If [code]true[/code], closes the polygon. A closed OccluderPolygon2D occludes the light coming from any direction. An opened OccluderPolygon2D occludes the light only at its outline's direction.
A [Vector2] array with the index for polygon's vertices positions.

constants.constant: Culling is performed in the clockwise direction. See [member cull_mode].
Culling is performed in the counterclockwise direction. See [member cull_mode].
